name: Finger Survival - How long can you survive in this 1st Ultimate fast reaction speed test challenge?
name_original: Finger Survival - How long can you survive in this 1st Ultimate fast reaction speed test challenge?
description:
Save your finger from dangers, DO NOT getting cut, can your survive the killing challenges?

It's never been so easy to play, just hold your finger on the screen and try to stay as long as possible!

- Test and train your reaction speed.
- Chanllenge 30 Unique levels.
- Compare your score with friends.
- Challenge CRAZY endless modes.
